paragraphs.first: Hello, my name is Isida (I am on the right) and I have a background in psychology, education, and Gestalt therapy. I started working as an animator at the age of 15 and have been inseparable from this fun and festive profession for over 16 years.
paragraphs.second: Hello, my name is Alisa. I have been working as an animator for over 7 years. I am the person who knows how to organize a team, always takes a responsible approach to work, and ensures the holidays are celebrated to the fullest.

second-block.title: Why You Should Trust Us
items: We have worked as animators in various companies in Riga, as well as gained experience in the city of Kaliningrad
We have extensive experience in volunteer work
We organize social events annually, such as 'Free Holiday for the Family' and 'Hospital for Plush Friends'
In 2015, we created the summer 'Corporation of Kindness Camp'

about-us.gallery-title: This is what our parties look like
